project_info.project_description: A JavaScript file system nosql database

20_May_2022: Completed the creation methods of a database, collection (farm), and documents (potato)
Completed the creation of Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations
21_May_2022: Changed the root structure of the database
Added initiating methods that the package user is going to interact with
Fixed some issues in the CRUD query validation private method
Created dropDatabase(), dropFarm(), and countPotatos() methods
Changed the returned value of the insert, update, and delete methods so that they return the affected potatos only
Added a third argument for the update methods to specify if the returned potato is the pre-updated or the updated version
Added a second argument for createFarm() method to specify if the farm file should be overwritten or not if already exists
22_May_2022: Replaced all new Error() constructors with new PotatoError() constructors
Implemented the sort() method on the PotatoArray class
Converted all the returned arrays out of the CRUD methods to PotatoArrays

TODOS: Potato methods (sort(), limit(), skip() on the find methods)
